modName: Real Crying Babies - An Immersive Sound Add-On For Foster XLB's Baby Mommas
summary: Foster xbl's revolutionary mod "Baby Mommas" adds mothers and infants to Skyrim. This add-on includes real baby sounds for further immersion! Subtle, NOT loud screaming infants!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][i]Foster xbl's revolutionary mod "Baby Mommas" adds mothers and infants to Skyrim.
[/i][/size]
[b][size=5]This add-on includes real baby sounds for further immersion!
[/size][size=4]Subtle, NOT loud screaming infants!

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84866-0-1498385227.jpg[/img][/size]
[/b]
[size=5][i]The original mod MUST be installed first for this add-on to work! [/i][/size]
[size=4]Please download it here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58618/?]Baby Mommas[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/970652]Foster xbl[/url].

[youtube]Ni2bDS_CCyc[/youtube]

[/size]The way this add-on works is that it introduces a sound loop to the "mother" npcs, as long as they are conscious.
If they are killed, the baby will stop crying.

PLEASE NOTE- Due to the way the original mod ties the baby into the mother's clothing mesh, if you have a mod that overwrites their clothing, you will have the sound of a crying baby, without an actual baby in their arms.
Therefore it is VERY IMPORTANT to make sure that Baby Mommas and it's patch after any other mods that modify NPCs. 


[size=4][b]

Credits[/b][/size]

Special thanks to Foster xbl for creating Baby Mommas and for giving me permission to share this add-on. 
(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58618/?)

Special thanks to sebastianlund of Freesound for sharing audio of his infant son under the creative commons licence, which I used as the basis for my audio file.
(https://freesound.org/people/sebastianlund/sounds/73765/)

Special thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim.
Special thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator [/center]
author: AlenisKendra
